comments:
Build: 20030625

If you define a view without an icon, and then double click on the view, you get
an NPE.  The method is:

	return x < titleLabel.getImage().getBounds().width;

and since titleLabel.getImage() returns null, you get the NPE:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at java.lang.NullPointerException.<init>(NullPointerException.java:63)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.ViewPane.overImage(ViewPane.java:283)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.ViewPane.access$7(ViewPane.java:282)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.ViewPane$6.mouseDown(ViewPane.java:302)
Added check for null image for both view and editor panes.
